channel.title: Spring Mvc on Chao Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Spring Mvc on Chao Yang

item.title: No mapping found for HTTP request with URI [WEB-INF/views/xxx.jsp]
item.description: When I use the InternalResourceViewResolver for the JSP rendering, I found the spring complains: No mapping found for HTTP request with URI [WEB-INF/views/xxx.jsp] I don’t know why. Normally, it certainly uses this resolver, because spring got the prefix and suffixÂ I set. I open the debug logging, and found the log says: -mvc-servlet forwards to WEB-INF/views/xxx.jsp -No handler method found So it goes to find a hander method, rather than renders directly.
